turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm doing pretty good. I'm headed down to Swift Boulevard and I'd like to order something from the Starbucks there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: There's a new drink and I would like four of them. And then I'd like a tall on all of them. And it's The name is called the Iced Starbucks Blonde Caramel Cloud Macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want any whipped cream or syrups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm. Yeah, let's get whipped cream on all four, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 4 tall Iced Blonde Caramel Cloud Macchiatos with whipped cream from the Starbucks on Swift Boulevard.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect, but I need to make sure that they're all made from soy milk cuz I'm allergic to regular milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, I've added soy milk to the instructions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Yeah, then I think the order will be perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is all set, it'll be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get the reciept via mobile.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, I'll head down there.

items.name: Iced Starbucks Blonde Caramel Cloud Macchiato
